byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi reported from Gaza City, and Diaa Hadid from Beit Sahour, West Bank.
byline.original: By MAJD AL WAHEIDI and DIAA HADID

abstract: Hamas calls for reinstatement of death penalty in Gaza for some crimes, move widely seen as go ahead for executions of several Palestinians who have been convicted of collaborating with Israel or of murder.
lead_paragraph: Several Palestinians convicted of murder or of collaborating with Israel face execution after the call by Hamas, the militant group that rules Gaza.

headline.main: Hamas Calls for Resumption of Death Penalty in Gaza

snippet: Several Palestinians convicted of murder or of collaborating with Israel face execution after the call by Hamas, the militant group that rules Gaza.
